categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Muller was a woman who served as a TIE fighter pilot in the Starfighter Corps of the Galactic Empire's military. She flew with Nashtah Squadron, a unit assigned to army operations. At one point before the Battle of Yavin, Muller's starfighter was hit by an anti-air warhead launched by the enemy Alliance to Restore the Republic. She ended up in bacta, and there was a probability that she would never be able to fly again.
Muller was first mentioned in "Last Call at the Zero Angle", a short story written by Jason Fry and published in Star Wars Insider 156 in 2015.
